title: Days
synopsis: For longer than she can remember, the monster Azami has been alone. Time passes her by, and she merely watches. Her loneliness finally ends when she gains a family. Yet human lives are fleeting, and Azami may have no choice but to face an unbearable tomorrow where she is alone once again.
staff: [['Jin', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Sidu', ['Animation Director']]]
